name: atom-autocomplete-swift-sourcekitten
description: Swift autocompletion for Atom, using SourceKitten.
author: Sam Deane <sam@elegantchaos.com> (http://elegantchaos.com)

SourceKitten Location.description: Path to the sourcekitten binary. Default behaviour is to search for it in $PATH, but you can specify an explicit location here if required.
